228.sentence: I'm going to begin by defining eugenics for those of you that don't know. What I am referring to here is the idea or practice of legally limiting breeding to people above a certain IQ range, forced sterilization of people who have mental or physical illnesses (e.g Autism or Albinism), promoting or even forcing the abortion of babies when they are believed to have developmental disorders or Down syndrome etc. I believe this is a good and desirable thing and the eradication of these people will be for the benefit of society as a whole
